p: Not enough IR or Raman data are available for group 2 (apart from Mg and Ca) and the rest of alanates of the periodic table. Additionally to the Figure 29, Figure 30 and Figure 31, an attempt to find trends that include the double-metal alanates of groups 1 and 2 was performed; no clear trends were found. This can open the possibility of theoretical and experimental studies to obtain these missing data and to obtain general rules that correlate structure and spectroscopic properties.
